name: Dry Skin
short-desc: Causes 1/8 max HP in damage each turn during strong sunlight, but heals for 1/8 max HP during rain.  Increases damage from fire moves to 1.25%, but absorbs water moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.
long-desc: This Pokemon takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage after each turn during strong sunlight, but it heals for 1/8 of its HP each turn during rain.  This Pokemon takes 1.25% as much damage from fire-type moves, but whenever a water move hits it, it heals for 1/4 its maximum HP instead.
